TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: Represents a collection of and -derived objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.

span.span: Represents a collection of and -derived objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的集合用於與資料來源控制項的進階資料繫結案例中的物件。The class represents a collection of objects used in advanced data-binding scenarios with data source controls. 物件用來將本機所包含的值繫結變數、 HTTP cookie、 工作階段變數和其他控制項的值，以擷取、 更新、 刪除和插入資料時，資料來源控制項。The objects are used to bind the values contained by local variables, HTTP cookies, session variables, and other controls' values to data source controls when retrieving, updating, deleting, and inserting data. 使用類別以程式設計方式管理一組物件。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 您可以加入、 插入和移除物件，使用的適當方法類別。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以程式設計方式擷取物件從一個集合，使用下列方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引子以取得單一從集合中，依名稱或使用陣列標記法的物件。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection, by name or using array notation. - 使用方法來建立-實作的物件，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 屬性集合中指定的項目總數，以及用來判斷集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以新增和移除集合中的項目，使用， ， ，和方法。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the , , , and methods. 根據特定的資料來源控制項，而參數儲存中的順序語意與實作集合可能十分重要。Depending on the implementation and the semantics of a particular data source control, the order in which the parameters are stored in the collection might be important. 例如，當使用控制項做為 ODBC 資料來源的順序中的物件集合必須是您使用參數化 SQL 查詢中參數的順序相同。For example, when using the control as an ODBC data source, the order of the objects in the collection must be the same as the order of the parameters in the parameterized SQL queries you use. 不過，當使用控制項與 Microsoft SQL Server 的順序物件並不重要。However, when using the control with Microsoft SQL Server, the order of the objects are not important. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用資料來源控制項時，值會插入到命令參數，不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。When you use data source controls, values are inserted into command parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用資料來源控制項中的事件，來執行命令之前，請驗證參數值。Use an event in the data source control to validate parameter values before the command is executed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 下表列出不同的參數類別和使用方式。The following table lists the different parameter classes and how they are used. |參數類別Parameter Class|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||參數的基底類別。The base parameter class. 使用繫結至區域變數或任何靜態字串使用屬性。Use it to bind to a local variable or any static string using the property.| ||可用來將繫結至控制項的屬性或方法的參數傳回的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to a control's property or method return value.| ||參數可以用於繫結至的 cookie 值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a cookie.| ||參數可以用於繫結至目前的 Web Form 網頁的屬性。A parameter that can be used to bind to an attribute of the current Web Forms page.| ||參數可以用於繫結至查詢字串上傳遞至 Web Form 網頁的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to a value passed to a Web Forms page on a query string.| ||參數可以用於繫結至工作階段變數的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a session variable.| ||參數可以用於繫結至 ASP.NET 設定檔屬性的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of an ASP.NET Profile property.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項和顯示從 Microsoft Access 資料庫中的資訊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 物件加入至集合使用方法。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將附加物件集合的結尾。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 這個方法的實作會採用所指定物件`param`參數，並將它附加至集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `param` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項和物件，以顯示從 Microsoft Access 資料庫中的資訊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a object to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 物件加入至集合使用方法。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/CS/fp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/VB/fp2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來建立並附加物件，其預設值至集合結尾。Use the method to create and append a object with a default value to the end of the collection. 這個方法的實作會建立物件使用所指定的名稱和預設值`name`和`value`參數分別，並將它附加至集合。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name and default value specified by the `name` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法可以用來加入新物件加入至集合，藉由提供`name`和`value`參數。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name` and `value` parameters. 在此範例中，物件加入至繫結的值來存取資料來源控制項的更新命令控制項。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that is bound to the value of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/CS/paramcoll2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/VB/paramcoll2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來建立並附加強型別物件，其預設值至集合結尾。Use the method to create and append a strongly typed object with a default value to the end of the collection. 這個方法的實作會建立物件使用的名稱、 類型和值所指定`name`，`type`和`value`參數分別，並將它附加至集合。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name, type and value specified by the `name`, `type` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法可以用來加入新物件加入至集合，藉由提供`name`， `value`，和`type`參數。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name`, `value`, and `type` parameters. 在此範例中，物件加入至提供的值為目前的系統時間的存取資料來源控制項的更新命令。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that provides the value of the current system time. 與加入參數的。The parameter is added with the of . remarks.format: ## Remarks `control`參數由用擷取集合中包含的物件和目前物件物件將繫結至。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 因為物件必須具有唯一名稱的項目但集合不需要或保證唯一物件名稱，這個方法的實作會將數字附加至每個尾端屬性若要確保傳回之集合中的唯一性。Because the object must have uniquely named entries but the collection does not require or guarantee unique object names, the implementation of this method appends a number to the end of each property to ensure uniqueness in the returned collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個索引子以取得物件依名稱從使用陣列標記法的集合。Use this indexer to get a object by name from the collection, using array notation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和索引子以移除物件從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the indexer to remove a object from a collection. 在此範例中，數個物件加入至集合、 一個，從集合中移除，並且載入頁面時印出集合的順序。In this example, several objects are added to a collection, one is removed from the collection, and the order of the collection is printed when the page loads. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/CS/qsp6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/VB/qsp6vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Performs additional custom processes after clearing the contents of the collection.

span.span: Performs additional custom processes after clearing the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫來執行額外的處理之後方法完成。The method is called to perform additional processing after the method completes. 它會呼叫方法。It calls the method.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作器定義必須刪除所有項目從基礎集合之後執行的處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 叫用標準之前行為，而標準之後叫用行為。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after deleting all the elements from the underlying collection. By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard behavior.

summary.span: Occurs when one or more objects contained by the collection changes state.

span.span: Occurs when one or more objects contained by the collection changes state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含的資料來源控制項，事件引發資料來源控制項的`DataSourceChanged`事件，造成任何資料繫結的控制項重新繫結。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's `DataSourceChanged` event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `control`參數由用擷取集合中包含的物件和目前物件物件將繫結至。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 如果目前值物件是在檢視狀態中快取的值不同方法呼叫。If the current value for the object is different from the value cached in view state, the method is called.
